column4: How do I check to see if I'm affected by the recent security bug that was found?
grep user-password /var/log/installer/cdebconf/questions.dat   if I remember correctly
if you've upgraded, there won't be anything there to worry about though
gimme a sec, gotta find it
it's OK - got it at the same momnet :)
When I grep, I get permission denied. That means I'm patched? Or did I do it wrong?
try sudo grep (the file has been made only readable by root
and the clear text is removed
I actually deleted the file before the patch was uploaded
Yeah I saw that a lot of people were doing that. I had just finished installing Ubuntu onto my laptop. I still have to get to my desktop, but I won't be able to for a couple days.
can you ssh to your desktop ?

Well, I set it up with Apache just a couple days ago. But I haven't done anything with ssh, I'm still pretty new to linux. I don't have it running as a server quite yet though so it isn't on...thankfully.
